definition: Moussavi, Mir Hussein (1941-), candidate in Iran's disputed 2009 elections
surname Mu
solemn/reverent/calm/burial position in an ancestral tomb (old)/old variant of 默
Bodhisattva/surname Sa
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

sentences.chinese: 穆萨维和雷扎伊昨天提出上诉。
但是穆萨维会做得更好。

sentences.english: Moussavi has also said he does not trust the Guardian Council.
sentences.chinese: 穆萨维还说他根本不信任宪法监护委员会。

sentences.english: Green is the campaign color of opposition leader Mir Hossein Mousavi.
sentences.chinese: 绿色是伊朗反对派领导人穆萨维的代表色。

sentences.english: Mr Mousavi’s statement marks a new line of attack.
sentences.chinese: 穆萨维先生的声明标志着一条新战线。

sentences.english: Parade day, Moussaoui limit travel by Iranian security forces.
sentences.chinese: 游行当日，穆萨维被伊朗安全部队限制出行。

sentences.english: Mousavi shouted slogans in Tehran Sunday as one person read Mr.
sentences.chinese: 穆萨维的支持者周日在德黑兰高呼口号。

sentences.english: The legal appeal by the opposition stander bearer Mir Hossein Mousavi has yet to run its course .
sentences.chinese: 反对派候选人穆萨维提交的法律诉讼还没有正常发展。

sentences.english: General Moussawi made the announcement on al-Iraqia TV.
sentences.chinese: 穆萨维将军在伊拉克电视上宣布上述消息。

sentences.english: Mousavi demanded the elections be annulled.
sentences.chinese: 穆萨维要求取消选举结果。

sentences.english: Clashes also took place outside the Mousavi campaign HQ, where several journalists were detained.
sentences.chinese: 穆萨维竞选总部外也发生了冲突，几名记者被拘留。
